actions.description: 3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 10 (4d4) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
actions.name: Bites

conditionImmunities: exhaustion, charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned, poisoned
name: Swarm of Mechanical Spiders

specialTraits.description: The swarm doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Constructed Nature

specialTraits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
specialTraits.name: Swarm

specialTraits.description: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb

specialTraits.description: While in contact with a web, the swarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
specialTraits.name: Web Sense

specialTraits.description: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
specialTraits.name: Web Walker
